pullRequest.title: Accumulo 2 API Updates
pullRequest.bodyText:
This depends on SNAPSHOT versions of the microservice API/utils and in-memory Accumulo. You will need to build the release/version2.0 branch of each of the dependent microservice projects.
Changes include:

Replacing Connector with AccumuloClient (and closing it when done, where feasible)
Using new, non-deprecated AccumuloInputFormat/AccumuloOutputFormat.
Using htrace instead of accumulo trace, which is now gone.

Note that the htrace changes haven't really been tested at all.

commit.message: Fix more Connector uses, and switch to new AccumuloInputFormat.
Put back config that was incorrectly commented out.
